name: Space Station ∞
description:
Game created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

♾️♾️♾️♾️♾️♾️

I little bit of Groundhog Day, I little bit of wildly inaccurate and made up science, but most of all a loop that is just waaaaay too big.

Tools:

  • Language: C++
    • IDE: Visual Studio Community 2019 (w/ Resharper)
  • Engine: Unreal Engine 4
  • 3D Modeling/Animating: Blender
  • Image Manipulation: Gimp
  • Sound Editing: Audacity
    • Music Generator: https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html
    • Sound Effects Generator: https://killedbyapixel.github.io/ZzFX/

Source Code: https://bitbucket.org/joebartlett-active/spacestationinfinity/src
